dataset.title: A revision of the Palaearctic species of the ant genus Cardiocondyla Emery 1869 (Hymenoptera: Formicidae)

abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Seifert, Bernhard (2023): A revision of the Palaearctic species of the ant genus Cardiocondyla Emery 1869 (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Zootaxa 5274 (1): 1-64, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.5274.1.1, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.5274.1.1

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all rights to these data and has dedicated them to the Public Domain (CC0 1.0). Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes, without restriction.

gbif.citation: Seifert B, plazi (2023). A revision of the Palaearctic species of the ant genus Cardiocondyla Emery 1869 (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Plazi.org taxonomic treatments database. Checklist dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/mrvrgb accessed via GBIF.org on 2023-08-28.

bibliography.citation: Seifert, Bernhard (2023): A revision of the Palaearctic species of the ant genus Cardiocondyla Emery 1869 (Hymenoptera: Formicidae). Zootaxa 5274 (1): 1-64, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.5274.1.1, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.5274.1.1
